title: Home
description: The highlights of Control and Telemetry Systems. Also floating cats!

features.heading: Precise Estimation
features.paragraph: A Kalman filter fusing barometric and accelerometer data estimates the altitude and velocity of your rocket.

features.heading: Safety & Redundancy
features.paragraph: Tons of safety features are in place to make sure your rocket lands softly on the ground. Backup timers can be configured and ground tests are easily conducted.

features.heading: Fully Open Source
features.paragraph: All our hardware designs and software is fully open source. Documentation and support is also available through our website and our Discord server.
